posts.post_content:
Working on my back run. Making good progress. Got my Old Mills, Tolstoi and Polar Bear. These three will complete my Pied and Sov.

Looking for help with these three.

Piedmont 460 / Fac 42
Sovereign 350 - Apple Green (Done)
Sovereign 150 (Deal Done)

My requirements are:

No paper loss, front or back.
No trimmed.
No markings or stamps.
Some minor creases are fine.
Prefer raw, but will consider graded.

I have some (as listed above) to trade or can buy PP FF.

See if you got any extras then, let's work out a deal.

Thanks.

-Jimmy

Got two of the three. Still need help with the piedmont 460 Factory 42.
If you have one you can spare, let me know. I'm sure we can work out a deal. Have some to trade or PP.
Thanks.
-Jimmy
